Plot: A romantic comedy where a bored, overworked Estate Lawyer, upon first sight of a beautiful instructor, signs up for ballroom dancing lessons.
Title: Shall We Dance
Actors: Richard Gere, Jennifer Lopez, Susan Sarandon, Lisa Ann Walter
tomatoConsensus: The cast is warmly appealing, but with the loss of cultural context and addition of big-name celebrities, this American version loses the nuances of the original.
